name: Dodgeball Hell
description:
This game was made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 41. The theme was Combine 2 Incompatible Genres.

This is a combination of bullet hell and sports.

The rules are simple, hit and don't get hit. Catch the balls your opponents throw at you (by clicking the ball when it gets close and turns yellow) and throw them back.

Controls:

WASD - move

Space - Dash

Left Mouse Button - Catch/Throw ball

R - Restart

Esc - Quit

Developed by:

- Carlos "Zactar" Gasperin

- Gabriel "The Scarecrow" Dall'Alba
